A space for exploring data architecture, agentic AI, lakehouse design, and the real-world challenges of building scalable data solutions. Maintained by Amine Kaabachi , a solution architect at Databricks.

You'll find practical insights, deep-dives, architecture slides, and lessons learned from working with organizations solving complex data challenges. Whether you're building your first data pipeline, your AI agent or architecting enterprise-scale solutions, there's something here for your journey.
